void PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK ( void *  pointer) [inline]

Test whether memory allocation was successful (i.e. check allocated pointer not NULL) and throw a generic error is allocation failed.

Parameters:
[in]pointerPointer that should point to allocated memory is memory allocation was successful.
